footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: The Art of Healing: A journey to your essence
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your inner self and awaken your consciousness.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us to live a transformative experience in a safe and caring environment.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the existing ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide a media URL or upload a file.
fullPlanUpTo: Complete plan with lodging up to ₡120,000
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound and transformative experience. Discover how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral beverage from the Amazon, prepared by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis). It is known for its profound healing and spiritual connection properties.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual level. It cleanses the body of toxins, helps release emotional blocks and traumas, and expands consciousness, allowing for a deeper understanding of oneself and the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: This sacred medicine is considered a master plant because it teaches, guides, and reveals deep truths. It is a powerful tool for self-knowledge, personal growth, and spiritual healing, always treated with the utmost respect and in a ceremonial context.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and clarity in their lives, understanding their path and mission more clearly.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the healing of deep traumas, depression, and anxiety, as well as physical cleansing and detoxification.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and allows for a deep connection with your inner self, nature, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a group setting, where the collective energy enhances the healing process. It's an opportunity to share and connect with others on the same path.
privateCeremonyDescription: A more intimate and personalized experience, tailored to your specific needs and intentions, with the full attention of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Beings of light and love who, with respect and humility, will accompany you on your path of healing and self-discovery. Each of them is trained to hold the space and the medicine with the necessary care.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. Conscious preparation is the key to opening yourself to healing.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by medicine, you will explore your inner world to heal and release.
experienceProcessDescription: During the ceremony, you may experience deep visions, emotional releases, and profound revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in integrating the teachings into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before and after the ceremony, we recommend a clean and light diet to prepare your physical and energetic body.
allowedFoodsList: Herbal infusions and plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsList: Processed foods, sugar, and spicy condiments
Sexual activity is also recommended to be avoided
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass that will guide your journey. Cultivate a state of calm and openness.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. What are you seeking? What do you need to let go of?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. It's a powerful tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. The key is to trust, surrender, and allow the medicine to work. Remember that you will be in a safe and supportive space. Do not resist the process; everything that emerges is for your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound night.
comfortItemsList: Blanket, sleeping bag, or mat, and a pillow
A change of clothes for the next day
essentialsList: A notebook and pen to write down your insights
An open heart and a willingness to surrender to the process
contactCommunityText: If you feel the call, don't hesitate to write to us. We are here to answer your questions and welcome you to our healing community. Follow us on our networks to stay connected.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's colors (values in HSL format).
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, soul on a journey. I am here to guide you. How can I help you on your path of healing and self-discovery today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting with the spiritual plane right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the details.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by the ceremony guides to ensure a safe experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants or anxiolytics?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the confidential information provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! To continue with your process for the ceremony with El Arte de Sanar, we invite you to fill out our confidential health form here:
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, access your history, and receive personalized information for your healing path.
tourWelcomeDescription: We're excited to have you. To personalize your experience and facilitate communication, please provide your phone number.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will use it to send you important information and reminders.
tourPhoneNumberError: Could not save the phone number.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and testimonials from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: Explore our next available ceremonies here. Click on one to see the details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Now, let's go to the most important step: your health questionnaire. It is essential for your safety and well-being.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Please provide a video URL or upload a file.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the memories carousel.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the video from the memories.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main background video of the page.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
dialogSuccessDescription: Thank you for providing your information. The next crucial step is to carefully review our preparation guide to ensure you have the best possible experience.
